org.coniks.coniks_server

Class KeyOps

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.coniks.coniks_server.KeyOps

  • public class KeyOps
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements all encryption-key related operations that a CONIKS server must perform. Current encryption/signing algorithm used: RSA with SHA-256.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KeyOps()

      static java.security.interfaces.RSAPublicKey loadPublicKey(java.lang.String keyOwner)
      Load the given server keyOwner's public key from the truststore indicated in this server's configuration config.

      Load this CONIKS server's private key from the keystore indicated in the server's configuration.

      Replaced with Keys.getDSAPublicFromParams(BigInteger, BigInteger, BigInteger, BigInteger).

    • Method Detail

      • loadSigningKey

        public static java.security.interfaces.RSAPrivateKey loadSigningKey()
        Load this CONIKS server's private key from the keystore indicated in the server's configuration.
        Returns:
        The server's private RSA key, or null in the case of an Exception.

      • loadPublicKey

        public static java.security.interfaces.RSAPublicKey loadPublicKey(java.lang.String keyOwner)
        Load the given server keyOwner's public key from the truststore indicated in this server's configuration config.
        Returns:
        The keyOwner's public RSA key, or null in the case of an Exception.

      • makeDSAPublicKeyFromParams

        @Deprecated
public static java.security.interfaces.DSAPublicKey makeDSAPublicKeyFromParams(java.math.BigInteger p,
                                                                          java.math.BigInteger q,
                                                                          java.math.BigInteger g,
                                                                          java.math.BigInteger y)
        Deprecated. Replaced with Keys.getDSAPublicFromParams(BigInteger, BigInteger, BigInteger, BigInteger).
        Makes a DSAPublicKey from its p, q, g and y parameters.
        Returns:
        the DSAPublicKey, or null in case of an error.

      • makeDSAPublicKeyFromProto

        public static java.security.interfaces.DSAPublicKey makeDSAPublicKeyFromProto(C2SProtos.DSAPublicKeyProto pkProto)
        Converts a C2SProtos.DSAPublicKeyProto to a DSAPublicKey.
        Parameters:
        pkProto - the DSA public key protobuf to convert into a DSAPublicKey.
        Returns:
        the DSAPublicKey, or null in case of an error.
